name: Online Course Registration System /enroll.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Online Course Registration System Online Course Registration System <=3.1"]
description: Online Course Registration System是一个在线课程注册系统。Online Course Registration System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/enroll.php中参数studentregno/Pincode/session/department/level/course/sem缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
